thread.title: Magisk Module to Force Audio Processing Through Viper4Android In Music Streaming Apps
thread.title_full: Magisk Module to Force Audio Processing Through Viper4Android In Music Streaming Apps

author: Kristin
title: Magisk Module to Force Audio Processing Through Viper4Android In Music Streaming Apps
text: If you’re facing issues while streaming music in applications such as Spotify or Pandora where the app doesn’t process your music through your equalizer application or audio mod, check out this Universal deep_buffer Remover module created by XDA Senior Member ahrion to fix the issue.
